item.description:
Chris Hart, technology and computer consultant and owner of MyMacTech (mymactech.com), will discuss new trends in file storage and software. Topics will include Cloud vs local storage, solid state/Fusion drives, and new types of connectors for external devices. Plus, a discussion of subscription software (specifically Adobe Creative Cloud and Microsoft Office 365), including the pros and cons, costs and limitations. We'll be sure to include a Q&A period after his discussion.

Reserve your place and pay using the Paypal link, $26 per person. Please be sure to add your meal choice in the "Instructions/Note" section of the Paypal transaction: Grilled vegetables & assorted Mediterranean salads; Beef Bolognese rustica with cavatelle; Pasta & chicken Francaise.

Reservation Deadline is Thursday, April 25, by end of day. To cancel, you must do so by this time or your payment will be forfeited. Please be aware that our deadline is required so the restaurant has adequate time to accommodate our group.

Our mission is to share ideas in a relaxed casual forum. Network and make new friends, treat yourself to a nice meal and enjoy the presentation. We hope to see you there.

group.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford

item.name: ICC Meeting: Cloud Vs Local Storage & Subscription Software
